title: Unable to connect to server. Please check your internet connection.... "Retry or cancel"
body:
I've played league recently and today just popped this table after picking champions and then, black loading screen with "retry or cancel". I tried everything what was on the internet:
* Firewall settings
* Changing internet options with DNS server configuration (8848 and 8888)
* Even through CMD I tried to write commands "netsh*" and refresh my ip
I just don't know what to do. I cannot play any kind of game... Please, anyone...?

replies.body: Sadly, Pac Man is above my skill level... I stick to easy games like League. :D

Looks like xReadyPlayerOnex linked a solid response, but I wonder if he can get a perfect score in Pac Man?  The Retry error you're getting does sound like a network issue, so our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help get that fixed up.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings to be sure.  Hope that helps!
